projects.title: Custom Portfolio
projects.details: I built this website to showcase my skills and experience. I wanted to create a website that was easy to navigate and had a modern look and feel and sleek animations. I created this website using Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and TypeScript. Its optimized for accessibility and performance, so it should work on any device.

projects.title: Rails Platform Improvements
projects.details: Implemented changes to model relationships, delivered admin tooling for the Customer Success team, and helped with SOC 2 and accessibility requirements. By interacting with other departments, I was able to understand their workflows and how to improve the application to better support their needs.

projects.title: IBM Zelle Integration
projects.details: One of three engineers to architect and deliver a P2P payments integration that interfaced with an existing payment processing monolith. Deployed successfully to several banks. Still in use today.
